title: Ep 288 | Behind the Scenes of 'The Chosen': That Jesus Wink, Rough Characters & No Hollywood Money
description:
Jase is a little nervous with Missy in the room again, but the guys are excited to talk with Dallas Jenkins, the filmmaker behind "The Chosen." Dallas offers a peek at the making of the series, including how they get the actors and sets to look rough and authentic and why it was important to do this without Hollywood money. Phil admits the series brought tears to his eyes more than once. Jase volunteers his services as a consultant to keep the outdoors scenes accurate. And Dallas talks about critics of the series, including people who take issue with Jesus winking.

Find out how to watch "The Chosen": http://thechosen.tv/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
